name: Crime Lair
description:
This is my first finished Unity build and it is made just for fun, so don't take it seriously.

 The game is about a gang trying to run their business and make money.  You can sell some things and even gang members in your lair to gain more cash. The game gives you two  mission options at a time. Each mission has it's own description, type, percent of success, reward, time to complete it and cost of failure.

Controls:

  • Use Left Mouse Button to sell objects
  • Use Right Mouse Button on objects to see what gang Boss thinks about it
  • Use big "!" button to see what missions you currently have and complete them

The goal is to get to 10,000$

Use executable version if any problems with WebGL version occur.
